stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains how the image represents a cultural landscape?

features.html:
A PHARMACY LOCATED IN CHICAGO, ILLINOIS

Photo: Dan Berry

choicesHtml: Multiple ethnicities share the same space in the neighborhood shown in the image.
The space shown in the image is an example of infilling within a specified neighborhood.
As shown in the image, there are multiple ethnicities found within this cityâ€™s greenbelt.
The process of suburbanization, as shown in the image, often results in multi-ethnic neighborhoods.
Brownfield development results in the creation of multi-ethnic landscapes like the one shown in the image.
